statements: SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, user_id, access_level FROM access_control_list WHERE resource = 'file.txt';
SELECT user_id, access_level, resource, id FROM access_control_list WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT access_level, resource FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY resource DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, access_level, resource FROM access_control_list WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE access_level = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, resource FROM access_control_list WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND access_level = 'User' ORDER BY resource ASC;
SELECT id, access_level, resource FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY access_level ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE resource LIKE '%document%' AND access_level = 'Manager' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT user_id, access_level, resource FROM access_control_list WHERE access_level = 'Admin' OR access_level = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE permission_level > 5;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM access_control_list WHERE permission_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM access_control_list ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM access_control_list JOIN user_roles ON user_roles.role_id = access_control_list.user_id;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM access_control_list WHERE permission_level BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources
SELECT user_id, resource_id, access_level FROM access_control_lists WHERE access_level = 'read'
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT users.user_name, resources.resource_name FROM users INNER JOIN access_control_lists ON users.user_id = access_control_lists.user_id INNER JOIN resources ON access_control_lists.resource_id = resources.resource_id WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'database';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(role_id) AS num_roles FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_roles > 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(role_id) AS num_roles FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_roles DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 5;
SELECT role_id FROM role_permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, permission_id FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id = 3 AND permission_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM user_permissions JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE user_id = 4;
